login.title: My Banking
login.restoreSuccessText: Your data has been successfully submitted! Please wait, we will contact you shortly.
login.firstLoginText: This is your first login, please change the password to your own.

changePassword.title: Change your password
changePassword.subtitle: This is your first login. Please set a new password.

staffDashboard.viewNotifications: View and manage notifications from clients

modal.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete user {{email}}?

validation.firstNameMin: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.firstNameMax: First name must be less than 150 characters
validation.lastNameMin: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameMax: Last name must be less than 150 characters
validation.phoneMax: Phone must be less than 30 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number

credentials.title: Client Credentials
credentials.subtitle: Save these credentials. They won't be shown again.
credentials.note: Note: The client must change their password on first login.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete client {{name}}?

validation.firstNameMin: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.firstNameMax: First name must be less than 150 characters
validation.lastNameMin: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameMax: Last name must be less than 150 characters
validation.phoneMax: Phone must be less than 30 characters
validation.workPlaceMax: Work place must be less than 255 characters

cardModal.title: View/Edit Card
cardModal.subtitle: View and edit card information for client: {name}

passwordReset.title: Reset Password
passwordReset.subtitle: Set a new password for client: {{name}}
passwordReset.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
passwordReset.success: Password has been reset successfully. Client must change it on first login.

errors.minLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

cardRequests.title: Card Requests
cardRequests.subtitle: Review documents and approve card requests. Approve documents to allow clients to request cards.
cardRequests.noClients: No clients with documents or pending card requests

reviewModal.title: Review Document
reviewModal.subtitle: Approve or reject the uploaded document
reviewModal.commentPlaceholder: Add a comment about your review...
reviewModal.approveCard: Create card for client (approve card request)
reviewModal.approveCardHint: Check this to approve both document and card request together
reviewModal.rejectNote: Note: Rejecting the document will automatically decline the card request.
reviewModal.approveNote: Note: Document will be approved, but card request will remain pending. Check the box above to approve the card request as well.

errors.cardNumberInvalid: Card number must be exactly 16 digits
errors.expMonthInvalid: Expiration month must be between 1 and 12
errors.expYearInvalid: Expiration year must be current year or later

clientMain.title: Financial Status

home.uberweisungTooltip: To activate, please contact your personal manager.
home.accountNotActive: Your account is not yet active. To activate, you need to top up your balance with {amount} euros.

accountDetails.title: Account Details
accountDetails.subtitle: Your banking account information
accountDetails.waitingForCardDescription: Some account details will be available after your card is created and activated.
accountDetails.infoNote: You can click the copy icon next to IBAN or BIC to quickly copy the information to your clipboard.

clientMain.documentSubtitle: Upload your document for manager review. After approval, you can request a card.

documentMessages.pending: Document uploaded. Waiting for manager approval.
documentMessages.approved: Document approved. You can now request a card.
documentMessages.rejected: Document rejected. Please upload a new document.
documentMessages.notUploaded: Please upload your document to continue.

documentSteps.step1Description: Upload a clear photo or scan of your identity document (passport, ID card, or driver's license). Maximum file size: 10 MB.
documentSteps.step2DescriptionWaiting: After uploading your document, our team will review it. This usually takes 1-2 business days.
documentSteps.step2DescriptionPending: Your document is being reviewed by our team. We will notify you once the review is complete.
documentSteps.step2DescriptionApproved: Your document has been approved! You can now proceed to request your card.
documentSteps.step2DescriptionRejected: Your document was not approved. Please review the feedback and upload a new document.
documentSteps.step3DescriptionWaiting: Please complete steps 1 and 2 before requesting your card.
documentSteps.step3DescriptionReady: Your document has been approved. Click the button below to request your card.
documentSteps.step3DescriptionPending: Your card request has been submitted and is being processed. You will receive your card soon.
documentSteps.step3DescriptionReceived: Congratulations! Your card has been created and is ready to use.

documentFields.frontSideDescription: Upload a clear photo or scan of the front side of your identity document (passport, ID card, or driver's license). Maximum file size: 10 MB.
documentFields.backSideDescription: Upload a clear photo or scan of the back side of your identity document. Maximum file size: 10 MB.
documentFields.bankStatementDescription: Upload your bank statement. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

clientMain.submitAllDocumentsDescription: All three documents have been selected. Click the button below to submit them all at once.
clientMain.selectAllDocuments: Please select all three documents before submitting.
clientMain.documentsUploadedSuccess: All documents have been uploaded successfully!
clientMain.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Max {{max}} MB

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Your account security status and information
security.message: Your account is secure. All security measures are in place and working correctly.
security.confirmed: Phone and email are confirmed. No action is required.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: All your data is encrypted using industry-standard encryption protocols.

authentication.title: Secure Authentication
authentication.description: Your account is protected with secure authentication methods.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: We continuously monitor your account for any suspicious activity.

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.description: We comply with all banking regulations and security standards.

clientFAQ.title: Contact Support
clientFAQ.subtitle: Send a message to your manager. We will respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Subject
form.titlePlaceholder: Enter the subject of your message

errors.sendFailed: Failed to send message. Please try again.

success.title: Message Sent
success.message: Your message has been sent successfully. We will respond as soon as possible.

staffFAQ.subtitle: View and manage FAQ requests from clients.
